content: felipe designed by joji locatelli ssssiiiizzzzeeee i used to have a lot of time to knit and i often made blankets and other elaborated hand-knits for every baby that popped up in my family one size newborn easily resizable and circle of friends but as time went by my finished measurements of the vest knitting time became very limited and also it seems that more and more babies are on their chest circumference 13 ½ 34 cm way so i had to come up with something that i could knit in one weekend length from shoulders to bottom 9 22 cm this is what i came up with a very basic baby ggggaaaauuuuggggeeee vest and a very simple hat 20 stitches and 30 row in stockinette stitch in i let the magnificent yarn do all the hard work the round on 4mm needles not crucial any i picked this one in particular because it is worsted weight will do… machine-washable the most important thing when gifting for a baby it is incredibly soft mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss and the colors are amazing i have already gifted a bunch of these and yarn malabrigo yarn rios 100% merino 210 mothers seem to love them so i went ahead yards 1 skein and wrote down the pattern i hope you enjoy needles us 4 3 5mm and us 6 4mm it circular needles © 2011 -
